title: Rebel Wilson is the epitome of old Hollywood glam in a stunning red gown
text:
She has three films under her belt for 2019.

And Rebel Wilson showed out to celebrate the premiere of her latest one entitled Jojo Rabbit on Tuesday at the Hollywood American Legion in Hollywood.

The 39-year-old comedienne oozed old Hollywood glamour in a floor-length red gown with sequined embroidery.

Lady in red: Rebel Wilson showed out to celebrate the premiere of her latest film entitled Jojo Rabbit on Tuesday at the Hollywood American Legion in Hollywood

She wore her blonde locks in silky waves and added a pop of color with a swipe of red lipstick.

Jojo Rabbit centers on Jojo, 'lonely German boy who discovers that his single mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their attic,' according to an official synopsis.

With the help of his only imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, 'Jojo must confront his blind nationalism as World War II continues to rage on,' the synopsis continues.

Classic: The 39-year-old comedienne oozed old Hollywood glamour in a floor-length red gown with sequined embroidery

Cool: Wilson threw up a peace sign as she posed with director Taika Watiti on the red carpet

Wilson plays Fräulein Rahm, an aggressive teacher in the Hitler Youth camp.

One of the lessons that she teaches her pupils is that the Jews are the equivalent of mythical creatures.

The Bridesmaids star has had a wildly successful year including her first credit for producing on The Hustle, a comedy inspired by Dirty Rotten Scoundrels.

Gang's all here! Chelsea Winstanley, Carthew Neal, Taika Waititi, Rebel Wilson, Roman Griffin Davis, Scarlett Johansson, Thomasin McKenzie, Sam Rockwell, Stephen Merchant, Archie Yates, and Alfie Allen posed together on the red carpet

She also served as executive producer for Isn't It Romantic, a rom-com she starred in alongside Liam Hemsworth.

And she landed the cover of Vogue in her homeland of Australia back in June.

Wilson is reportedly dating entrepreneur and Hollywood insider Jeff Beacher, 46.
description: She has three films under her belt for 2019. And Rebel Wilson showed out to celebrate the premiere of her latest one entitled  Jojo Rabbit on Tuesday at the Hollywood American Legion in Hollywood.
